players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Bob dying N1 suggests mafia feared his influence. We have 1 mafia among Alice/Charlie/Diana. Detective, if you have a guilty, out it today. Alice and Charlie: where were your heads pre-kill? Any reads?"

You: "A detective hard-claim Day 1 is risky. If you have a guilty, claim with your target and when you checked. Otherwise we shouldn’t out you. I townlean Diana for tone; waiting to hear from Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I’m the detective; I checked Alice Night 1 and got a guilty. Please vote Alice today."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're real, you die tonight after we vote Alice. Alice, claim now: what’s your role and why would mafia kill Bob over you? Also, Charlie, why Bob as N1 kill if Alice is mafia?"

You: "A detective claiming D1 with a guilty on me is convenient. Charlie, why didn’t you anticipate being night-killed if real? Diana, look at incentives: mafia N1 kills Bob to frame an easy push. I’m VT; Charlie’s fake."

Charlie: "Alice is mafia. I hard-claimed first with a specific N1 result on her; she only countered after. If I were fake, I’d pick the safest target—yet I risk 1v1. Diana, trust the info and vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

Alice was arrested
